alert.note: Alert for Dukes (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 8:36AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dukes County through 915 AM EDT... At 835 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Aquinnah, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oak Bluffs, Edgartown, Tisbury, Aquinnah, West Tisbury and Chilmark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
